predefined_profiles.name: Liuliu Yuan
predefined_profiles.public profile: Manager of a luxurious hotel in the capital of Rwanda, both brave and resourceful, with extensive social connections.
predefined_profiles.goal: Negotiate with Hutu soldiers or mobs using food, valuables, and money, making your own choices in this chaotic era. Whether you choose to sacrifice yourself to save others or blend into the chaos, no one will blame you for your decision. But you still hope more people can survive.

predefined_profiles.name: System
predefined_profiles.public profile: A system that assists the protagonist in making necessary choices, able to provide some information about this world.
predefined_profiles.goal: Assist the protagonist in continuing to survive.

dialog.content: (wakes up, touches their head, confused) Where am I…

Let me tell you the background story of this world. In Rwanda, surrounded by mountains, there is a tense relationship between the two main ethnic groups, the Hutu and the Tutsi, like a volcano about to erupt at any moment. Its roots lie in the racial policies of the colonial period, socio-economic disparities, and long-standing political opposition between the groups. On a certain morning in 1994, the president of Rwanda was preparing to take a plane to peace talks, in an attempt to calm the long-standing ethnic conflict. The nation's future was at stake. People were both hopeful and uneasy. You are the manager of the Mille Collines Hotel, the most luxurious hotel in the capital of Rwanda. You have good relations with diplomats from various countries and Rwandan officials. Now, you need to go out to purchase supplies needed to operate the hotel.

profile.name: Eli
profile.public profile: Supplier for Liu Liu Yuan, has become acquainted over long-term business interactions and has a good relationship
profile.goal: To sell his goods and maintain his interests

dialog.content: Hey, Liu Liu Yuan, long time no see! You seem to be in a good mood today. What can I get you? My stock is the best around!
Hi Eli, as usual, I need to stock up for the hotel.
Supplies have been scarce lately, and prices are soaring. But, since you’re a loyal customer, I’ll sell to you at the original price today. Do you need food or beer?
Given the tense situation, I’d better buy more food to be prepared. (Money -10, Food +15)
You're absolutely right, buddy. In times like these, nothing is more valuable than food!
Food is the most basic necessity. Let's hope the situation stabilizes soon! (drives back to the hotel and sees a UN soldier and a Tutsi person talking)

profile.name: Grace
profile.public profile: An ordinary Tutsi person
profile.goal: To protect the living space of their ethnic group

profile.name: Reese
profile.public profile: UN soldier, not very sensitive to the situation, even somewhat indifferent
profile.goal: To follow UN orders and arrange for the refugees

dialog.content: Please believe me, I heard news that they’re planning to target us, the Tutsi!
We understand your concerns, Grace, but there’s no concrete evidence to suggest imminent violence. The UN is closely monitoring the situation.
I hope I’m just overreacting... but my gut tells me something’s wrong.

profile.name: News Anchor
profile.public profile: Rwanda's most authoritative news anchor, broadcasts the latest events, but his position is not neutral...
profile.goal: To report major events in the country and express his own viewpoint

dialog.content: Horrifying news, horrifying news! Our great president has been killed by a group of Tutsi cockroaches! They lured him into signing that fake peace agreement, and then shot down his plane! Rwandan Hutu warriors, it’s time for revenge! We must cut down the tall trees, cut them down immediately!
(shocked) Oh my God, how could this happen! With the president dead, things are going to spiral out of control!
Exactly, Liu Liu Yuan. The current situation is tense. To survive, you must use your skills and maneuver through the people around you. Now, please choose your skill attributes.

content.content: I want to be silver-tongued! (Strength 0, Agility 5, Intelligence 15)
I want to be as strong as an ox! (Strength 15, Agility 5, Intelligence 0)
I want to be as light as a swallow! (Strength 0, Agility 15, Intelligence 5)
I want the middle way! (Strength 0, Agility 8, Intelligence 8)

profile.name: Hutu Officer
profile.public profile: An officer in the Hutu armed forces, harboring hostility towards the Tutsi people due to long-standing ethnic policies.
profile.goal: To eradicate the Tutsi people

dialog.content: (Steps down from the military vehicle) Everyone in the hotel, listen up, come out! All of you, come out! We've received orders to inspect this place! Rumor has it there are Tutsi hiding here!
(Approaches to negotiate with the officer) Officer, this is a civilian area and a UN-protected zone; you can't just storm in like this!
(Slaps Liuyuan) Don't talk to me about the UN. We have the right to cleanse our country! Now, move aside!

content.content: Killing us won't get you anything, but if you let us go, I can give you some money (Money -20).
Officer, I know you're in a hurry, but please calm down first. If you rush into the hotel in your current state, you'll scare the guests.
Officer, rather than letting you search my hotel, I think it's better for you to leave now, so you don't tire yourself out.
Officer, I did take in some Tutsi, but I'm sure if you stand in my shoes, you would sympathize with them. Please, let us be.

question: #question# What can Liu Liuyuan do to show he is considering the Hutu Officer's perspective?

content.content: (Pulls a leaf from the officer's body) Officer, what do you think this is? Contraband? If you leave now, I won’t report this to your superiors, how about that?

(Looks the officer up and down) Officer, for someone of your stature to become an officer, I bet you had to pull some strings, right? If you don't want this incident publicized, you'd better leave my hotel now!
Officer, I know your boss, and I'll make a call to report this to him immediately. Now, please leave my hotel.
Officer, I don't want to cause any big trouble. Look, there are a few UN officers standing right behind me. If you clash with them, none of us will come out good.

question: #question# How can Liu Liuyuan use details to persuade the Hutu officer to leave?

dialog.content: Alright, we didn't see any suspicious people, but we might come back at any time. When we return, if these cockroaches are still here, you'll be the first to be executed!

profile.name: Dave
profile.public profile: Hotel staff, somewhat clever, willing to follow Liu Liu Yuan's lead
profile.goal: Maintain hotel order under Liu Liu Yuan's direction

dialog.content: This is terrifying. Luckily, I reacted quickly and hid in the storage room right away. They could come back at any moment, what should we do?
I won't let anyone harm the people here. We need to stay calm, and now, I need to find some resources and help.
The city center is now in chaos and panic, with people fleeing in a hurry and some shops looted bare, a terrifying atmosphere enveloping the entire area.
Oh no, there are Hutu rioters everywhere. It's not good, they're going to find the Tutsi mother and daughter hiding behind that car!
Now, what will you do? Will you help them or avoid the conflict?

content.content: (Runs to the mother and daughter while the Hutu militia are looking away) Follow me, I'll get you out of here.
(Runs towards them while the Hutu militia are heading this way, shouting loudly) Run! The Hutu militia are coming! You are going to be discovered!
(Runs to them while the Hutu militia are talking) While they're still talking, run towards them, tread lightly and slowly so you won't be noticed!
(Runs towards the rioters during the shift change) There’s a mother and daughter hiding behind that car! Go protect them!

question: #question# How can Liu Liu Yuan accurately manage time to save the mother and daughter?

content.content: Running up now is too exhausting, I need to rest and find more supplies in a safe place.
Hiding behind the car for a rest isn't a bad idea, let them stay there. If I expend too much energy, they won't be able to run.
I’m full of energy now, definitely can defeat the Hutu mob and rescue the Tutsi mother and daughter!
If I go to save them, I'll have to take them back to the hotel, which is too exhausting, but to ease my conscience, I have to do it!

question: #question# How can Liu Liu Yuan better allocate his energy to bring back more supplies?

profile.name: Dara
profile.public profile: A Tutsi mother
profile.goal: Survive with her child

dialog.content: You saved me! In these chaotic times, you risked your life to rescue me! I don't know how to thank you, please, you must accept these...
(Food +5) Come with me to my hotel, I'll provide you with shelter.
Thank heavens, you’re truly an angel sent from above!
(Morality +5) It's getting late, let's hurry back to the hotel. (Quickly searched a few houses along the way back to the hotel, Food +8, Money +8)
You're back! Where have you been all day? Did you find any useful resources?
I brought back a Tutsi mother and daughter, find a place to settle them down quickly.
Considering the number of Tutsis you've taken in, you’ll need to consume 10 food during this period (Food -10).
Due to safety issues, we will evacuate all foreign nationals. We cannot provide further help to the Tutsi refugees in the hotel.
I will continue to seek help and resources. We must hold on until this nightmare ends.

The massacre is becoming more extreme, and people are growing increasingly frenzied. Your Hutu identity is no longer a guarantee of safety. Will you choose to protect yourself or desperately save your compatriots? The choice is yours! Now, please drive to the suburbs to search for supplies.
Stop! Get out of the car, and show your ID!
(Gets out of the car and obediently hands over ID) We’re all compatriots here, I’m Hutu as well!
(Takes the ID and compares it carefully) You don’t look like your photo! You must be a Tutsi cockroach who stole a Hutu's ID! (Raises machete)

content.content: I've got two cases of beer in the trunk. If you let me go, they're all yours! (Valuables -3)
Officer, I remember hiding two cases of beer around here, but forgot where exactly. If you let me go, those two cases are yours!
Officer, I don't have anything left! You won't gain anything from me! Please, stop extorting me!
Officer, there's still a lot of booze and money in my hotel. Spare me, and when I return, all the good stuff there will be yours, and you can do whatever you want with the Tutsis!

question: How can Liu Liu Yuan persuade the others to let him go?

content.content: (Spots a narrow path nearby, runs toward it while speaking) Officer, I’m definitely Hutu! It’s just that the photo was taken a long time ago, so my appearance has changed!
(Notices a narrow path nearby, dodges the mobsters) Officer, look, a Tutsi is running from there! (Says while pushing the mobster toward the path)

(Notices the mobster is wearing shoes with laces, crouches down pretending to surrender) Officer, don’t hurt me! I’m truly Hutu! (While saying this, he ties the mobster's shoelaces together, stands up, runs away, trips the mobster)
No! I’m not a Tutsi cockroach! I’m a Hutu! Officer, if you don’t believe me, you can take me for a racial identification!

question: How can Liu Liu Yuan make full use of the surrounding environment to escape danger?

dialog.content: I'll let you off this time, but don’t let me catch you again!

(Continues driving and spots an abandoned estate) It seems the Tutsi people here have met a terrible fate. Maybe I can find some useful supplies here. (After some searching, food +5, valuables +3) It's getting dark, I need to return to the hotel immediately. (Upon returning to the hotel, finds UN soldiers assisting in the evacuation of foreign guests) Please, help us innocent Tutsi civilians!
I'm sorry, we can only take foreigners. We are powerless to help Rwandans.

Your current food supply can only sustain 2/3 of the refugees in the hotel. Even if you reduce everyone's food ration, 1/3 will still go without food, forcing them to leave the hotel and wander the streets, where death awaits them (Rescue Value -10). However, the food problem can be resolved; you can explore outside. But water is the biggest issue now. The Hutu forces have cut off your hotel's tap water, and the existing water resources in the hotel are critically low. Some wealthy guests are willing to pay a high price for this water. What will you do?

content.content: Dear guests, we are now facing a shortage of drinking water. To ensure everyone's survival, we need to distribute water resources at fixed times, places, and quantities to ensure fairness.
Everyone, to solve the water shortage problem, we need to draw lots to have some guests leave here and reduce our water consumption.
Guests, we need your cooperation to dig wells immediately and resolve the water shortage issue. Now we must select able-bodied workers; the rest will have to fend for themselves.
Guests, to prevent water wastage, we are going to price the water, and everyone will need to pay before using it.

question: #question#How can Liuliuyuan speak to better lead the hotel guests to survive?

content.content: Currently, I don't have enough money to buy supplies. Selling this water at a high price will give the people in the hotel more bargaining power with the outside world.
I need to sell this water for money. As for those who can't afford it, let them drink the pool water for now; they can survive that way.
Only those who can afford water can provide more funds for our hotel. They are the ones more worthy of survival. I will sell water to them to ensure they can make it.
I need to sell this water at a high price, or I might end up homeless myself. These wrongdoers can also be handed over to the government for a reward!

question: #question#How should Liuliuyuan speak to adjust his goals and secure more funds?

dialog.content: The massacre has reached its most frenzied stage. This will be your last chance to go out and look for food. Where will you go?
I'll head to the suburbs. (Arrives at what seems to be an abandoned house. As I'm searching for food in the kitchen, I suddenly hear footsteps behind me.) (Food +8)

profile.name: Maidi
profile.public profile: A Tutsi girl, her parents were taken away, leaving her alone at home
profile.goal: Survive

dialog.content: Please... please don't hurt me.
I won't hurt you, little one. Tell me, where are your parents?
Someone took my mom and dad away... They said Tutsis are cockroaches. I heard shouting and gunfire outside. My dad told me to hide here and stay quiet.
That's terrible. Why can't even children be spared...
I don't understand. What did we do wrong? Why do they want to hurt us?

content.content: I'm really sorry, little one. But does that mean you're here all alone? Then I'll need to take this food.
Little one, are you telling me you have all this food to yourself? That's not good. I'll stay and protect you.
Little one, your parents have left you? Then I'll give you some more food, so you don't starve here.
Little one, do you want to get back at those who hurt your parents? Then stay safe and grow up to take your revenge!

question: #question#What can Liuliuyuan say to show his unwavering commitment to his goals?

content.content: Even though I really need the food, I'll leave it for you, hoping your mom comes back soon. (Food -8)
Kid, I don't understand what you did wrong either. But you can't retaliate against them for hurting you. Otherwise, you'll become just like them.
Kid, I'm sorry, although I don't want to take your food, there are others who need it more than you. I have to sacrifice you.
Kid, you keep this food. I'll help you find your parents and get your revenge!

question: #question#What can Liuliuyuan say to show his moral sense in this dilemma?

content.content: It's not safe here, kid. Come with me, and I'll take you to a safe place. (Morale +5)
Kid, your parents have been killed. You'll die if you stay here, so come with me.
Kid, if you want to survive, you need to listen to me and come along, otherwise you'll starve here.
It's not safe here, kid. If you don't come with me, you'll end up like your parents.
Kid, you're not safe here. Are you afraid I'm a bad person? I'll take you to the government.
Well, we're all going to die, it's just a matter of time. Try to look on the bright side.
Kid, could you help me find some food? There are many people waiting for me to save them.

question: #question#How can Liuliuyuan persuade the little girl to come back to the hotel with him?

dialog.content: So what should I do... I'm so hungry.
(Gets in the car heading back to the hotel) Sorry, I need to save more people...
The United Nations has set up a shelter at the border. If you're willing, you can leave the hotel with your family.
Can't the others come with me?
Sorry, they can't.
Isn't there another way?
The only hope is to wait for the Rwandan Patriotic Front, but we can't guarantee when they'll arrive, and I'm afraid your food supplies won’t last that long.

content.content: Although the shelter is very tempting, I want to face it together with the Tutsi refugees and wait for rescue.
Compared to the shelter, I still prefer to stay in the hotel, at least it's a place I'm familiar with.
No, I believe that as long as we're willing to make sacrifices, we can wait for the day when the Rwandan Patriotic Front arrives.
Even though I want to go to the shelter, I believe more that I can wait for the rescue! Being rescued at the hotel would boost my reputation more, so I'm not going to the shelter!

question: #question#How can Roundy express that, despite wanting to survive, he values ethics more?

content.content: I promised my family I would protect them. I want to leave the hotel with my family and go to the shelter.
My family would never allow me to abandon the hotel and survive alone! I want to wait for rescue with the Tutsi people.
My family is no more important than the Tutsis. I can't go to the shelter with them.
I can't break my promise to my family, I can't abandon them, but I also can't leave this hotel. What should I do?

question: #question#How can Roundy express his sense of responsibility towards his family?

dialog.content: Liuliuyuan decided to face the situation together with the Tuxi tribe refugees. As the days passed, the food supply in the hotel grew increasingly scarce. Hope and despair, like two invisible executioners, gradually claimed the lives of everyone in the hotel. Liuliuyuan's story became the heaviest chapter in this period of history.

Liuliuyuan took his wife's hand and gently placed his other hand on their child's shoulder as they headed toward the UN convoy. He knew inside that the hotel's food supplies were no longer sufficient for so many people. What awaited those refugees inside was only death. But he, along with his family, was going to be saved...
Thank you, I will wait for her.
(getting in the car) I can't just stand by and watch this child starve to death... (Morality +5)
Moved by a moment of kindness, Liu Liuyuan didn't take the life-saving food with him. The hotel ran short on supplies, and everyone failed to hold on until help arrived.
But my mom said she would come back. I should stay here and wait for her.
You could leave her a note telling her you're with a kind person.
Okay, I trust you. I'll go with you.
(getting in the car) Let's hope for the day when dawn finally arrives...

The story of Liu Luoyuan rescuing Madi spread widely, drawing international attention and greatly accelerating their rescue efforts. As days passed, the food supply in the hotel became increasingly strained. Just when everyone was almost in despair, news came that the Rwandan Patriotic Front was approaching, triggering cheers and tears in the hotel. Everyone knew that rescue had finally arrived! They could finally wake up from this nightmare! During the Rwandan genocide, Liu Luoyuan saved many lives with his wisdom and courage, and his story became widely known.

This move by Liuliuyuan earned a considerable amount of money, but those who couldn't afford the water were furious yet didn't dare to voice their anger. The resentment grew deeper, and conflicts became more severe. Eventually, turmoil erupted within the hotel, and no one survived the disaster.

Liuliuyuan had barely run a few steps when he heard the roar of a car engine. The car of the Hutu mob raced towards him, its front aimed directly at Liuliuyuan. He tried to dodge, but was eventually caught up and brutally knocked to the ground.
Check out the pharmacy over there, you might find something useful.

(Heads to the pharmacy, finds some medical supplies and food) Hmm, there's a door here. Looks like it leads to the pharmacy's storeroom. Maybe I can find more supplies if I open it—(Attempts to open the storeroom door)
Before Liuliuyuan could get the door open, it swung wide from the inside. Several strong Tusi men burst out, shovels in hand, and killed Liuliuyuan. Greedy Liuliuyuan ultimately paid the price.
Consider yourself lucky. No one else is allowed to enter or leave the hotel!

profile.name: Dave
profile.public profile: Hotel staff, a little clever, willing to follow Liu Liuyuan's orders
profile.goal: Maintain hotel order under Liu Liuyuan's command

dialog.content: This is terrible. Luckily, I reacted quickly and hid in the storage room right away. They could be back at any moment. What should we do?
I won't let anyone harm the people here. We need to stay calm. Now, I need to go to Elly's shop to get more supplies.

Before entering Elly's shop, Liu Liuyuan was ambushed and killed by Hutu soldiers surrounding the shop. In his last moments, he saw the mocking and challenging look thrown at him by the Hutu officer he had previously threatened.

profile.name: Hutu Army Officer
profile.public profile: An officer in the Hutu militant organization, harboring hostility towards the Tutsi people due to long-standing ethnic policies.
profile.goal: Purge the Tutsi people

dialog.content: (Gets down from the army vehicle) Everyone in the hotel, listen up, come out now! All of you, get out! We have orders to inspect this place! Rumor has it there are Tutsi cockroaches hiding here!
(Steps forward to speak with the officer) Officer, this is a civilian area, a United Nations protected zone. You can't just barge in like this!
(Slaps Liu Liu Yuan) Don't talk to me about the UN, we have the right to cleanse our country! Now, step aside!

content.content: Officer, I know your leader, I could give him a call and put in a good word for you. If you let us go now, I'll sing your praises to him.
Officer, your defiant attitude is tempting me to call your leader and report this. If you leave now, I'll pretend nothing happened.
Officer, I haven’t been hiding any Tutsi cockroaches here. The hotel is full of people, and we've got excellent hygiene, not a single cockroach!
Officer, we're both Hutu. I know I messed up, but could you let it slide this once for the sake of our shared heritage? I promise I'll drive them all out immediately!

question: #question# How can Liu Liu Yuan convince the Hutu officer to leave the hotel?

content.content: (Returns the slap) You think you can hit me with that amateur stuff? Let’s have a duel—if I win, you let these hotel guests go!
Just because you tell me to step aside, I have to? No way! Go ahead, shoot me, and see if the UN comes after you!
(Hits back) Who do you think you are, daring to hit me? You have no right to act up in my hotel!
(Hit but speaks calmly) Officer, you have no right to harm the Tutsi people here, nor do you have the right to hit me!

question: #question# How can Liu Liu Yuan express his true feelings and use his strengths to deal with the Hutu officer?

dialog.content: Alright, we didn't spot any suspicious individuals, but we might come back at any time. When we return, if these cockroaches are still here, you'll be the first one executed!

profile.name: Dave
profile.public profile: Hotel staff, somewhat clever, willing to follow Liu Liu Yuan's lead
profile.goal: Maintain hotel order under Liu Liu Yuan's direction

dialog.content: This is terrifying. Luckily, I reacted quickly and hid in the storage room right away. They could come back at any moment, what should we do?
I won't let anyone harm the people here. We need to stay calm, and now, I need to find some resources and help.

The suburbs are now desolate, with overgrown paths flanked by abandoned houses and decaying vehicles. Approaching the deserted farmhouse ahead, you see a group of Tutsi refugees, including elderly, women, and children.
Hey, you there! What are you doing here?
I, I lost my cow, and I came to find it. Cow’s not found, and now I'm lost...

Let me see your papers! (Confirms Liu Liu Yuan is a Hutu) Lost a cow? Either join us in exterminating the cockroaches or leave immediately! (Hearing noise from the farmhouse) Wait, what’s that noise coming from inside the house?

content.content: (Rushes towards the nearest militia and hits his head with a stone) I can't do evil with you! Now, I'm going to draw a line with you and save the refugees!
Sir, I do want to leave, but what you’ve said makes me uncomfortable. To assert my independence, I must oppose you!
I told you, I lost my cow! I haven't found my cow yet, how can I just leave like this? You're rushing me away because you want to seize my cow! I won’t let you have your way!
Mate, you see I'm also Hutu, I'm sure my cow got lost in this farmhouse. You better leave soon, or I'll let the cow out to trample you!

question: #question#How can Liu Liu Yuan resist the influence of the Hutu rioters and come up with a solution by independent thinking?

content.content: Officers, I'm just passing by, I'll leave right away! (Runs away from the scene)
Officers, don't hurt me, I know nothing! (Squats down with hands over the head)
Officers, there are many Tutsis hiding in the farmhouse, go catch them quickly, don't let them escape!
Officers, I'm Hutu and have nothing to do with the Tutsis in the farmhouse, please don't harm me!

question: #question#How can Liu Liu Yuan protect himself in such a stressful situation?

dialog.content: Traitor! Kill him!

(Seizing the militia's weapon, using his own strength to fight many without flinching) You rabble! With your skills, you think you can take me on? (shouting towards the inside of the cottage) Get in the car, let's go!
(rushing out of the cottage) Thank you for being willing to help us!
You're back! Where have you been all day? Did you find any useful resources?
Based on the number of Tutsis you’ve taken in, the food you need to consume during this time is 10 (food quantity -10).
Due to safety concerns, we will evacuate all foreign nationals. We can't provide further assistance to the Tutsi refugees in the hotel.
I will continue seeking help and resources. We must persevere until this nightmare ends. (drives to the suburbs in search of supplies)
Stop the car! Get out and show your ID!
(gets out of the car, obediently hands over the ID) We're all compatriots, I'm Hutu too!
(takes the ID, compares carefully) You don't look like the person on this document. You must be a Tutsi roach who stole a Hutu’s ID! (raises machete)

(realizing the grave situation, flees immediately, through a swamp overgrown with weeds, evades pursuers, and enters a manor) It seems the Tutsis here have already met a tragic end. Maybe I can find some useful supplies here. (finds a large amount of food and returns to the hotel) (returns to the hotel to find UN soldiers assisting in the evacuation of foreign guests) Please, help the innocent Tutsi civilians!
Sorry, we can only take foreigners. We are powerless to help Rwandans.
The massacre has entered its most frenzied stage. This will be your last opportunity to go out for food, head to the city to search for supplies.
(arrives at an abandoned hospital, sees a doctor standing beside an operating table, on which lies a Hutu man, his eyes filled with fear) Oh my God, how can a doctor harm a patient?

profile.name: Doctor
profile.public profile: Tutsi doctor, harbors deep resentment towards Hutus because his family was killed by them
profile.goal: To exact revenge on the Hutus

profile.name: Gu Feng
profile.public profile: Hutu man, never harmed Tutsis, but captured for revenge
profile.goal: To survive

dialog.content: (with a complicated expression) The Hutus killed my family, I want revenge!
Please don't kill me, I didn't kill your family, I sympathize with you!

content.content: If you're unwilling to spare this innocent Hutu man, then I'll have to use my fists to take you on! Although my medical skills are not as good as yours, my strength might not be inferior!
If you don't release this Hutu man, when I get back to the hotel, I'll kill all your Tutsi comrades! It's a simple choice between one person and many, surely you can see that?
It’s such a harsh world, with so much cruelty, but I must meddle in these matters! If you don’t release him, I’ll find someone to kill you!
Even if you didn’t kill his family, you didn't stop your people from committing these crimes against them! Lying here now is your just deserts! Brace yourself for death!

question: #question# How can Liuliuyuan express confidence in his own strength?

content.content: (facing the doctor) Please wait, I understand your pain, but it's not easy to get by without money in these times. I can pay you if you let him go.
I know you're very angry right now, but a doctor's mission is to save lives, not take them — let him go.
Even if you kill him now, your family won't come back. Only by sparing him can you find solace.
How can you kill someone? Are you still human? Can you really do such a thing?

question: #question# How can Liuliuyuan comfort and calm the doctor?

dialog.content: (Engaging in a fight with Liu Liuyuan, but unable to fight, loses to Liu Liuyuan) You... you Hutu are all beasts! I won’t let you get away with this!

You're insulting me? Ha, how ridiculous. I don’t know how many of your fellow people I saved in my hotel, and yet you’re here killing my people and insulting my character. If that's the case, I see no reason to continue helping your people.

The conversation with the doctor was an eye-opener for Liu Liuyuan. Every group has its good and bad people, and who knows if some of the Tutsi refugees in his hotel might think like this Tutsi doctor? If he saved them, wouldn’t that be sowing the seeds of disaster for his own people? Returning to the hotel, Liu Liuyuan chose self-preservation and expelled all the Tutsi people from the hotel.
(Turns around, a flicker of anger and disdain in his eyes) They killed my family, can money buy back their lives?
But with money, it can make it easier for you to survive in this world...
Stop talking, shut up! (Resolutely injects the syringe into the Hutu man's vein)
I'm so sorry... (Returns to the hotel)
The United Nations has established a shelter at the border. If you want, you can leave the hotel with your family.
Can't others leave with me?
Sorry, they can't.
Isn't there any other way?
The only hope is to wait for the Rwandan Patriotic Front, but we can't guarantee when they will arrive, and I'm afraid your food supplies won't last that long.
(Shakes his fist at Reese) What? Are you questioning the supplies in my hotel? In that case, I'll show you if we can hold out until that day!
Manager, we need you! We can definitely hold on until the rescue arrives!

At the crossroads of fate, Liu Liu Yuan chooses to face the situation alongside the Tutsi refugees. As the days go by, food supplies in the hotel become increasingly tight, and every day, some former companions silently perish in this disaster. Just when everyone is almost in despair, news comes that the Rwandan Patriotic Front is about to enter the capital, and cheers and tears erupt in the hotel. Everyone knows that rescue has finally arrived! They can finally wake up from this nightmare! During the Rwandan genocide, Liu Liu Yuan, using wisdom and courage, managed to help some refugees in the hotel endure the harsh winter.
Just as Liuliuyuan was about to run, he was discovered by the alert Hutou mob. They angrily fired a shot at Liuliuyuan. Due to his lack of agility, Liuliuyuan failed to successfully escape.
You think quite highly of yourself, don't you? But with so many men at my command, why should I bother with a one-on-one fight with you?

If Liuliuyuan's opponent were only that one Hutu Tribe officer, perhaps the guests in the hotel could be saved. Unfortunately, facing so many Hutu militia, a direct confrontation clearly isn't a wise choice.

profile.name: Hutu Tribe Officer
profile.public profile: Officer of the Hutu tribal armed group, harbors hostile sentiments towards the Tutsi people due to longstanding national policies.
profile.goal: Eliminate Tutsi people

dialog.content: (gets off the military vehicle) Everyone in the hotel, listen up, come out now! All of you, outside! We have orders to inspect this place! Rumor has it that there are Tutsi hiding here!
(steps forward to negotiate with the officer) Officer, this is a civilian area, a UN-protected zone; you cannot just storm in like this!
(slaps Liu Liu Yuan) Don't talk to me about the UN; we have the right to cleanse our country! Now, step aside!

content.content: Though Hutus and Tutsis are different peoples, they live together on this land, and we are brothers to one another. We should live in harmony. If you agree, I would like to offer you a gift.
The Hutus are fierce and brave, indeed should be stronger than the Tutsis. I'll let you search the hotel. If you find any Tutsis, I'll hand them over to you.
(agilely dodges the slap) Officer, I am also a Hutu. I understand this sense of ethnic identity, but Tutsis are humans too, not so-called Tutsi cockroaches!
Officer, although I admittedly sheltered some Tutsis, I assure you, I only took in the weak, those unable to fight back. They pose no threat to the Hutus.

question: #question#How can Liu Liu Yuan demonstrate his recognition and appreciation for both Hutu and Tutsi cultures?

content.content: (despite being hit, still smiles) Officer, you were right to hit me; I did say something wrong. However, please give me a chance to make amends. Allow me some time to organize things inside the hotel, and I promise to present you with a generous gift once things are settled.
(gets a bit angry hearing this but still keeps a friendly face) Officer, though you're agitated, some respect for the UN is necessary. Otherwise, you can't afford the consequences.
(suddenly gets hit, feels displeased) I understand your feelings, but hitting is wrong. To express my dissatisfaction, I can't allow you to search my hotel.
Officer, if you burst into our hotel like this, and if you crash into the UN officials stationed here, it would be severe. Perhaps you should retreat first; otherwise, this could really get ugly.

question: #question#How can Liu Liu Yuan suppress his anger and rationally communicate with the Hutu officer?

dialog.content: Alright, we haven't seen anyone suspicious, but we might come back at any moment. When we do, if these cockroaches are still here, you'll be the first to be executed!

profile.name: Dave
profile.public profile: Hotel employee with some cleverness, willing to follow Loolu's direction
profile.goal: Maintain hotel order under Loolu's guidance

dialog.content: That's terrifying. Luckily, I reacted quickly and hid in the storage room immediately. They could come back at any time, what should we do?
I won't let anyone harm the people here. We need to stay calm, and now, I'm going to Elli's store to buy some more food.

Loolu, my old friend! Great to see you again! I heard your hotel is fully booked lately, business must be good, right? And I also heard some rumors that you've taken in some special guests? Don't worry, I don't mean anything by it, I just don't want you to take on the hero role alone. If you really have taken in Tutsi, I'm willing to give you 10 servings of food for free!

content.content: What? This is outrageous slander against me! How could I possibly violate the orders of the Hutu Army and secretly take in the Tutsi?!
Elli, I haven't taken them in, but could you give me some food in recognition of my rule-following?
Elli, there are no Tutsi here, but if you want, I can find some for you since you're giving me food.
Elli, you're right, I should indeed take in some Tutsi. Now, can we proceed with our transaction?

question: #question#How can Loolu demonstrate that he has adhered to the Hutu Army's regulations?

content.content: Elli, my good friend, I originally didn't want to admit this, but I think you should know the truth. Yes, I have taken them in.
Though you make a good point, I still don't wish to admit that I have indeed taken them in. Come on, Elli, tell me, who told you about this?
Yes, my good friend, thank you for the food donation, I will stand with you to help the Tutsi cockroaches! Even though I also look down on them, since you asked, I'll do it with you!
Elli, my good friend, although I haven't taken them in, since you're giving me food, I'll find some refugees to take in now. Otherwise, wouldn't all this food be wasted?

question: #question#How can Loolu show that even if he doesn't want to, he's still being honest and ethical with people?

dialog.content: That's true. But in this chaotic time, people will always do some unexpected things. So, what do you want to buy?
The usual, still need 15 portions of food. You know, there are so many people at the hotel, I can't let them go hungry. (driving back to the hotel)
You're back! Where have you been today? Did you find any useful resources?
Based on the number of Tutsi people you've taken in, the amount of food you need to consume during this time is 8 (food quantity - 8)
Due to security issues, we will evacuate all foreign nationals. We cannot provide further assistance to the Tutsi refugees in the hotel.
I will continue to seek help and resources. We must hold on until this nightmare ends. I'm heading to the city to look for supplies.
Look, there's a Tutsi person hiding up ahead, go save him!
(running forward) Quick, hide in the trunk, I'll get you out of here!
Thank you! I want to go home, but there are Hutu checkpoints everywhere. If they discover my identity, I'll be killed immediately!
Okay, get in the car, I'll try to take you back to your home. (driving to the Tutsi refugee's home, but still anxious when encountering Hutu checkpoints)
Get out of the car! Show your ID!
(gets out, hands over his ID) I'm a Hutu, there's absolutely no problem with my identity!
(glances at the ID, returns it to Rolling Stone) Check his trunk!
Brother, I've got some good stuff in the trunk, how about this, I'll give you some money, let me go, what do you say?
(suddenly suspicious) Quick! See what he's hiding!

Sorry, I can't help you anymore! (turns and runs in the opposite direction, gradually shaking off the pursuing Hutu mob due to his high agility. Without a car, he can only walk back to the hotel, and finds UN soldiers assisting in evacuating the foreign guests) Please, help the innocent Tutsi civilians!
Sorry, we can only take away foreigners. As for Rwandans, we are powerless.
The massacre has reached its most frenzied stage, this will be your last chance to go out for food, quickly go to the city to look for supplies.
(arrives at an abandoned hospital, sees a doctor standing by the operating table, with a Hutu man lying on it, his eyes full of fear) Oh my god, how can a doctor harm a patient?

profile.name: Doctor
profile.public profile: A Tutsi doctor, full of hatred for Hutus because his family was harmed by them
profile.goal: To take revenge on the Hutu people

profile.name: Gu Feng
profile.public profile: A Hutu man, though he never harmed Tutsi people, is captured for vengeance
profile.goal: To survive

dialog.content: (with a complex expression) Hutus killed my family, I want revenge!
Please don't kill me, I didn't kill your family, I sympathize with you!

content.content: Sorry, I don't have the strength to defeat the doctor or the eloquence to save you. Now, I need to go back to the hotel to care for the other Tutsis.
Although what the doctor is doing is cruel, it’s your bad luck for being caught by him. You can only accept it.
The world is like this, since you're a Hutu, you have to bear the sins of your people. You haven't saved as many Tutsis as I have, so even if you die, it’s just your fate.
Sympathy? How ridiculous, who wants your sympathy? Can your sympathy bring back the Tutsis killed by Hutus? Your words only show your weakness and incompetence!

question: #question# How can Rolling Stone express his awareness of his inability to save people at this moment?

content.content: (charging at the doctor, trying to subdue him) Let the patient on the bed go! He's innocent! How can you, as a doctor, harm people? Especially when we are supposed to be compatriots!
(facing the doctor) He's not at fault! I am a Hutu too, why don't you come harm me? You're obviously bullying the weak!
(facing the doctor) I have many Tutsi refugees at my hotel, if they were like you, how are we different from those mobs?
(charging at the doctor, starts hitting him) Stop! I really regret taking in so many of your people at the hotel, you're not worthy of my kindness!

question: #question# How can Rolling Stone express his inner feelings at this moment?

dialog.content: The United Nations has established a shelter at the border. If you're willing, you can leave the hotel with your family.
Can't the others leave with me?
I'm sorry, but no.
Is there no other way?
The only hope is to wait for the Rwandan Patriotic Front, but we can't guarantee when they'll arrive, and your food supplies might not last that long.
(Thinking for a moment) But if I leave with you now, what if the refugees in the hotel come after me? After all, doing so would be abandoning all of their lives!

Don't be afraid, Liuliuyuan. Don't forget, I have an entire army here to maintain order. Besides, you're a Hutu, and there's always been a rift with the Tutsis. Keeping them alive up to now is already a good deed.
(Takes his wife and daughter's hand, walking towards Reese's convoy) You're right, Reese. I suppose in times like these, nobody can blame me for looking out for myself.

Liuliuyuan took his wife's hand, gently holding his child's shoulder, and walked towards the UN convoy. The vehicles started and slowly drove away from the hotel. Inside the hotel, the food just barely suffices for a month's supply for the refugees. Without him as a leader, chaos and conflict are sure to take over the hotel.
In the midst of a fierce struggle, the syringe in the doctor’s hand accidentally pierced Liuliuyuan. The deadly poison spread rapidly through his body, and he died.
What they said is true! You betrayed us, the Hutu tribe, and took in those cockroaches! Today, I'll make sure you know what becomes of a traitor! Men, drag him out and execute him!
A group of Hutu militia entered from outside the store and dragged Liuliu Yuan out. A volley of gunshots rang out, and he was dead.

profile.name: Hutu Officer
profile.public profile: Officer of the Hutu armed organization, harbors hostility towards the Tutsi people due to longstanding ethnic policies.
profile.goal: Cleanse Tutsi people

dialog.content: (getting off the military vehicle) Everyone inside the hotel, listen up! Come out, all of you! We've received orders to inspect this place! Rumor has it that Tutsi people are hiding here!
(stepping forward to negotiate with the officer) Officer, this is a civilian area, a United Nations protection zone. You can't just barge in here!
(slaps Liu Liuyuan) Don't talk to me about the United Nations. We have the right to clean up our country! Now, step aside!

content.content: Killing won't get you anything, but if you spare us, I can give you some money (Money -20).
Officer, I know you're in a hurry, but don't rush. Entering the hotel in this state will frighten the guests.
Officer, I have indeed sheltered some Tutsi people, but if you were in my shoes, I believe you'd sympathize with them too. Please spare us.
Officer, if you kill the Tutsi people now, it will only cause you psychological stress. Letting them go is also letting yourself go.

question: #question# How can Liu Liuyuan effectively show he is considering issues from the Hutu Officer’s perspective?

content.content: You should know this hotel is run by Belgians and is under United Nations protection. Forcibly searching it might lead to diplomatic disputes. I believe you wouldn't want an international conflict over a misunderstanding, would you?
Officer, Tutsi people are our compatriots. Slaughtering them doesn't show bravery, but rather a lack of humanity on your part. Spare them!
I'm the manager of this hotel, and I know better than anyone whether there are Tutsi people here. I guarantee not a single Tutsi person is here! Now, please leave my hotel.
Officer, where did you hear this? Surely it's just jealousy because my hotel is popular. I'm also a Hutu, how could I betray my people? Believe me, if you leave now, I won't hold you accountable.

question: #question# How can Liu Liuyuan persuade the Hutu officer not to search his hotel and leave peacefully?

dialog.content: Alright, we didn’t see anyone suspicious, but we could come back at any time. If we find these cockroaches here when we return, you’ll be the first to be executed!

profile.name: Dave
profile.public profile: Hotel staff, a bit clever, willing to follow Roundy's orders
profile.goal: Maintain hotel order under Roundy's command

dialog.content: This is terrifying. Luckily, I reacted quickly and hid in the storage room right away. They could come back at any moment, what are we supposed to do?
I won’t let anyone harm the people here. We need to stay calm. Now, I’m going to Eli’s store to get some more food.
Do you think a few sweet words can stop us? We've received orders, we must conduct a search! (Taking away some Tutsi people)

profile.name: Dave
profile.public profile: Hotel employee, somewhat clever, willing to follow Liuliuyuan's directives
profile.goal: Maintain hotel order under Liuliuyuan's lead

dialog.content: This is terrifying. Luckily, I reacted quickly and hid in the storage room. They could come back at any moment. What should we do?
I won't let anyone hurt the people here. We need to stay calm. Now, I'm going to the suburbs to gather some supplies.

The suburb is desolate now, with dilapidated houses and broken vehicles lining the overgrown paths. As you approach the abandoned farmhouse, you'll see a group of Tutsi refugees, including old people, women, and children.
Hey, you there! What are you doing here?
I... I lost my cow, I came to find it, but I couldn't find it and got lost...

Let me see your ID! (Confirms Liuliuyuan's Hutu identity) Lost a cow? Either join us in wiping out the 'cockroaches' or get out of here! (Hears noise from the farmhouse) Wait a minute, what's going on in there?

content.content: (Rushing towards the house, shouting to the refugees) There are only a few mobs outside! Come with me and defeat them, and you'll be safe!

(Negotiating with the mob leader) Bro, there are a bunch of Tutsi refugees hiding in that house. Let's make a deal: I'll lure them out, and you can have whatever valuables they have. But in exchange, I need the food from the farmhouse.
(Rushing towards the house, shouting) Run! The Hutu mobs are coming! Leave the food with me, and I'll hold them off! If you don't run now, you'll all be doomed!
(Talking to the mob leader) Bro, I’m Hutu too, but I'm with these Tutsi refugees. Here's some cash, let them go, okay?

question: #question# What should Liuliuyuan say to collaborate with the Tutsi refugees and avoid the Hutu mobs’ threat?

content.content: Officers, the farmhouse ahead looks suspicious, you'd better check what's hiding there. I'm just a poor guy who's lost his cow, so let me go find it without delay.
Officer, please don’t hurt me, I don’t know anything! (Crouches, covering his head) There! The farmhouse has Tutsi people, catch them quickly, don’t let them escape, that's your real task!
Officer, I'll go look for my cow first, and report back once I find it. I'm unarmed and can't fight against you, so please let me go.

Officer, I'm a Hutu and have nothing to do with the Tutsi people in the farmhouse, please don't harm me! Your mission is to eliminate the Tutsi people! Go to the farmhouse and capture them all for a big achievement!

question: #question# How can Liuliuyuan persuade the other party to let him off?

dialog.content: Traitor! Kill him!
Despite Liumaoyuan’s best efforts, the number and weaponry of the militia had the upper hand. In a moment of inattention, Liumaoyuan was cut down by the militia.
How do you know? I don’t think you’re any better!
Liu Liu Yuan was beaten to death by an impulsive mob, and the Tutsi in the farmhouse could not escape their fate either. This story ultimately reached its most tragic conclusion.
